item.title: Caroliss Minerran
item.description: Caroliss Minerran is the commander of the Iomedaean knights stationed at Castle Urion, in the Felldales of Numeria, tasked with providing protection to those traveling on the Sellen River. Under her command, the knights have come into possession of an advanced technological device once part of the systems used in the starship Divinity to plot and control wormhole travel. The paladins quickly began studying the device, knowing that its abilities would be invaluable in tracking and detecting both Abyssal rifts and demonic teleporting.
